g.text: Consume Position event message for Payer
Request latest position from DB for Payer
Retrieve latest position from DB for Payer
Validate Calculated latest position against the net-debit cap (netcap) - Rule: lpos < netcap
Request to persist latest position for Payer
Persist latest position to DB for Payer
Persist Transfer State (with transferState='RESERVED' on position check pass)
Request latest position from DB for Payer
Retrieve latest position from DB for Payer
Validate Calculated latest position against the net-debit cap (netcap) - Rule: lpos < netcap
Persist Transfer State (with transferState='ABORTED' on position check pass)
